document_data.name: Hansen
document_data.mainbody: '''Hansen''' was an [[Ilmatari]] [[acolyte]] and child of Brother [[Hodges]].
document_data.Personality: The community of the Gate treasured Hansen and others that worked at the shrine.
document_data.Relationships: Hansen had a sibling known as [[Sissa]].
document_data.History: In [[1482 DR]], Hansen helped to maintained the [[Shrine of the Suffering]] in [[Baldur's Gate]]. During this time, Hansen was not old enough to marry, but a decade later, Hansen reached such an age.
